name: Smartphone Case
description: This smartphone case is made of durable silicone material and is designed to fit snugly over your phone, providing a protective barrier against scratches, drops, and other types of damage. It has precise cutouts for easy access to ports and buttons.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Yoga Mat: Our yoga mat is made of non-slip, eco-friendly material that provides a comfortable and supportive surface for your yoga practice. The mat is lightweight and easy to carry, making it perfect for use at home or on-the-go.

name: Electric Kettle
description: This electric kettle boils water quickly and efficiently, making it ideal for making tea, coffee, or instant noodles. It has a stylish, stainless steel design and a removable filter for easy cleaning.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: This portable power bank is a must-have for anyone who relies on their devices for work or entertainment. It can charge your phone, tablet, or other devices quickly and easily, and has a compact, lightweight design that makes it perfect for travel.z

name: Hair Dryer
description: This hair dryer features multiple heat and speed settings to help you achieve the perfect look. It has a powerful motor and a compact design that makes it easy to use at home or on-the-go.

name: Water Bottle
description: Our water bottle is made of BPA-free, eco-friendly material and is designed to keep your beverages hot or cUsed for hours. It has a leak-proof cap and a sleek, stylish design that makes it perfect for use at the gym, office, or on-the-go.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: These wireless headphones provide high-quality sound and a comfortable fit, making them perfect for music, movies, or phone calls. They have a long battery life and a sleek, lightweight design that makes them easy to use on-the-go.

name: Essential Oil Diffuser
description: This essential oil diffuser uses ultrasonic technology to create a relaxing, aromatic atmosphere in your home. It has a stylish, modern design and features multiple lighting options to help create the perfect ambiance.

name: Cooking Utensils Set
description: Our cooking utensils set includes all the essentials you need to prepare and serve delicious meals. The set includes a variety of utensils, such as spoons, spatulas, and tongs, all made of high-quality, durable materials.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: This fitness tracker helps you keep track of your daily activity, including steps taken, calories burned, and distance traveled. It has a sleek, modern design and is compatible with both iOS and Android devices.

name: Resistance Bands
description: These resistance bands are perfect for anyone looking to tone and strengthen their muscles. The set includes multiple bands of varying resistance levels and comes with a convenient carrying bag for easy storage and transport.

name: Desk Lamp
description: This desk lamp provides bright, energy-efficient lighting for your workspace. It has an adjustable arm and multiple brightness settings, making it perfect for use while reading, working, or studying.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: This Bluetooth speaker delivers high-quality audio and features a portable, compact design. It is compatible with various devices and has a long battery life, making it ideal for outdoor activities and gatherings.

name: Digital Camera
description: Capture your precious moments with this high-resolution digital camera. It offers advanced features, multiple shooting modes, and easy connectivity options for sharing your photos and videos.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Enjoy wireless convenience and smooth navigation with this ergonomic wireless mouse. It provides precise tracking and a comfortable grip, enhancing your productivity during work or gaming.

name: Portable SSD
description: Store and transfer your data quickly and securely with this portable SSD. With high-speed performance and durable design, it's an ideal storage solution for professionals and travelers.

name: Air Purifier
description: Create a cleaner and healthier environment with this efficient air purifier. It filters out allergens, pollutants, and odors, improving the air quality in your home or office.

name: Smart Watch
description: Stay connected and track your fitness with this feature-packed smartwatch. It offers a range of health monitoring functions, notifications, and customizable watch faces.

name: Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Experience wireless freedom and immersive audio with these Bluetooth earbuds. They offer noise-cancellation, long battery life, and a comfortable fit, making them perfect for workouts or daily use.

name: Gaming Keyboard
description: Enhance your gaming experience with this feature-rich gaming keyboard. It offers customizable backlighting, programmable keys, and a responsive design for optimal performance.

name: External Monitor
description: Expand your display setup with this high-resolution external monitor. It provides a larger workspace, vibrant colors, and adjustable settings for improved productivity and multimedia experiences.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Control and optimize your home's temperature with this smart thermostat. It offers programmable schedules, energy-saving features, and compatibility with voice assistants for convenient control.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Simplify your charging routine with this wireless charging pad. It supports fast charging for compatible devices and features a sleek design that complements your workspace or bedside table.

name: Digital Drawing Tablet
description: Unleash your creativity with this digital drawing tablet. It offers pressure sensitivity, customizable shortcuts, and a responsive surface for a natural drawing experience.

name: Air Fryer
description: Cook healthier meals with less oil using this versatile air fryer. It offers multiple cooking functions, intuitive controls, and a spacious capacity for preparing a variety of dishes.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: Monitor and secure your home with this smart doorbell. It provides HD video, two-way audio, motion detection, and remote access through a smartphone app for enhanced convenience and safety.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Keep your floors clean effortlessly with this smart robot vacuum cleaner. It offers intelligent mapping, automatic charging, and various cleaning modes for efficient and hands-free cleaning.

name: Wireless Security Camera
description: Monitor your property with this wireless security camera. It provides high-definition video, night vision, motion detection, and remote access for peace of mind and enhanced security.

name: Smart Scale
description: Track your fitness progress and body metrics with this smart scale. It offers accurate measurements, compatibility with fitness apps, and multiple user profiles for personalized health monitoring.

name: Portable Bluetooth Printer
description: Print photos and documents on the go with this portable Bluetooth printer. It offers wireless connectivity, compact size, and high-quality prints for capturing memories or printing important information.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Control and automate your smart devices with this central smart home hub. It offers compatibility with various smart home protocols, voice assistant integration, and a user-friendly interface.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Achieve optimal oral hygiene with this electric toothbrush. It offers multiple cleaning modes, a built-in timer, and replacement brush heads for maintaining a healthy and bright smile.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Enhance your gaming performance with this wireless gaming mouse. It offers high precision, programmable buttons, and customizable RGB lighting for a personalized gaming experience.

name: Smart Plug
description: Turn your devices into smart devices with this smart plug. It provides remote control, scheduling, and energy monitoring features to make your home more convenient and energy-efficient.

name: Wireless Gaming Controller
description: Improve your gaming experience with this wireless gaming controller. It offers ergonomic design, precise controls, and compatibility with various gaming platforms for immersive gameplay.

name: Smart LED Light Bulbs
description: Transform your home lighting with these smart LED light bulbs. They offer adjustable colors, dimming capabilities, and smart controls for creating the perfect ambiance and saving energy.

name: Car Dash Cam
description: Capture your journeys and ensure safety on the road with this car dash cam. It offers high-definition video recording, loop recording, and built-in GPS for recording crucial details.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy high-quality audio wirelessly with this portable Bluetooth speaker. It offers a compact design, long battery life, and powerful sound for your music, podcasts, or outdoor gatherings.

name: Smart Lock
description: Secure your home and enjoy keyless entry with this smart lock. It offers various access methods, remote control, and activity monitoring for enhanced convenience and security.

name: Portable Power Bank
description: Stay powered up on the go with this portable power bank. It offers high-capacity charging, multiple ports, and a compact design for keeping your devices charged anytime, anywhere.
